ctf.infosecinstitute.com: Level 10

Bounty: $100 Description:

What kind of sound is this? Sorcery perhaps?? “listen”

Write-up

To solve this one I used Audacity a software for recording and editing sounds. Adjust the Playback speed to 0.13x and play it. You can hear the message for the flag. “infosec_flagis_sound” ## Links * http://ctf.infosecinstitute.com/levelten.php
